meanings.definition: A skin condition characterized by the formation of boils or abscesses.
meanings.sent1: Her furunculosis caused her discomfort due to the painful boils on her skin.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with furunculosis after noticing the abscesses on their body.
meanings.sent3: Despite its name sounding like a fancy dish, furunculosis is actually a serious skin issue.
meanings.sent4: The spread of furunculosis in the community was like a wildfire, affecting many individuals.
meanings.sent5: The sight of her furunculosis was etched in his memory, a reminder of the painful condition.

meanings.definition: The presence of multiple furuncles on the skin.
meanings.sent1: The severity of her furunculosis increased as more boils appeared on her skin.
meanings.sent2: The dermatologist confirmed the diagnosis of furunculosis based on the numerous furuncles present.

meanings.sent4: The furunculosis on his skin spread like a constellation of painful stars.
meanings.sent5: The image of the crowded furunculosis on her skin was both alarming and unforgettable.
